item.title: Mexico Shelves Planned Shipment of Oil to Cuba Amid US Tensions - Bloomberg.com
item.description: Mexico Shelves Planned Shipment of Oil to Cuba Amid US Tensions Bloomberg.comExclusive: Mexico weighs stopping oil shipments to Cuba amid concerns of Trump retaliation, sources say ReutersMexico will continue sending oil to Cuba despite US blockade, Sheinbaum says Anadolu AjansıMexican oil for Cuba: No public data to verify who it reaches CiberCubaOpinion | Sheinbaum’s Cuba policy is testing Washington’s patience The Washington Post
